Welcome to Astro Icon!

The SpriteSheet component will create an optimized spritesheet including only referenced SVG files inside of src/icons/. It should be included once per page, at the end of body.

Tip! SpriteSheet can be included in a Layout component for ease of use!

Individual icons can be referenced using the Sprite component. Internally, this uses <use> element.

Alternatively, see the Icon method.

Local

Custom remote source

Local dependencies

Automatic icons from service

If you can find it on Icones, you can render it here!
